items.title: Garrett gets sack No. 23 to set NFL season record
items.description: Browns defensive end Myles Garrett set the NFL's single-season sack record Sunday with a sack of Joe Burrow to give him 23 on the season.

items.title: Titans QB Ward's season ends with hurt shoulder
items.description: Titans quarterback Cam Ward left the season finale at Jacksonville after landing on his right shoulder on a touchdown run.

items.title: Ravens-Steelers winner takes AFC North: 'Going to be a slugfest'
items.description: For years, this feud has become must-watch TV, and Sunday won't be any different in a "winner-takes-all" game.

items.title: Sources: Belichick adds Edwards to Heels QB mix
items.description: Former Wisconsin quarterback Billy Edwards Jr. has committed to sign with North Carolina, sources told ESPN.

items.title: Badgers land dual-threat QB Joseph as transfer
items.description: Wisconsin has landed quarterback Colton Joseph, the team's top QB target for 2026. Joseph was eighth in the nation in total offense while helping lead...
